metadata.title: Come Holy Spirit
metadata.description: A prayer invoking the Holy Spirit to fill us with His gifts and graces
metadata.origin: Traditional Catholic prayer, commonly used in devotional practice
metadata.usage: Recited to invoke the Holy Spirit's presence and gifts, especially during prayer and meditation

la.text:
Veni, Sancte Spiritus, reple tuorum corda fidelium et tui amoris in eis ignem accende.

Veni, Sancte Spiritus.

en.text:
Come, Holy Spirit, fill the hearts of Thy faithful and enkindle in them the fire of Thy love.

Come, Holy Spirit.
en.notes: Common English translation used in Catholic prayer

es.text:
Ven, Espíritu Santo, llena los corazones de tus fieles y enciende en ellos el fuego de tu amor.

Ven, Espíritu Santo.

fr.text:
Viens, Esprit Saint, remplis les cœurs de tes fidèles et allume en eux le feu de ton amour.

Viens, Esprit Saint.

de.text:
Komm, Heiliger Geist, erfülle die Herzen deiner Gläubigen und entzünde in ihnen das Feuer deiner Liebe.

Komm, Heiliger Geist.

it.text:
Vieni, Spirito Santo, riempi i cuori dei tuoi fedeli e accendi in essi il fuoco del tuo amore.

Vieni, Spirito Santo.

pt.text:
Vem, Espírito Santo, enche os corações dos teus fiéis e acende neles o fogo do teu amor.

Vem, Espírito Santo.

pl.text:
Przybądź, Duchu Święty, napełnij serca wiernych swoich i zapal w nich ogień swojej miłości.

Przybądź, Duchu Święty.
